name: Grill - Maker Let's BBQ' Lite
description:
Prepare your own BBQ a variety ingredients to choose from. All kind of sauces, vegetables, cheeses, meats, fishes and other specialities want to become a perfect BBQ on your plate. No matter what part of the world you live, you're vegetarian or you love meat, you will find some delicacy of your taste. Serve the perfect dish on the plate of your choice and make it unique with some accessories.
You can setup the size of all ingredients and rotate for the best place. Add a personal message or a picture and send it to us in e-mail or share on facebook. Bon Appetit!
